__e: Those sure as hell looked like shoulders to me.

Back then, 27 seemed so far off...
Not that long ago, things seemed so simple.
The other girls were looking so happy and she looked quite forlorn.
So I suffered... Until death, nothingness. Suddenly, it didn't seem so bad.
